name: Psi Boost
trigger: When you use an ability that is a main action or a maneuver with the Psionic keyword.
effect_scope: You can spend additional Discipline to apply one or more psi boosts to enhance that ability.

boosts.name: Dynamic Power
boosts.effect: If the ability force moves a target, the forced movement distance gains a bonus equal to your Intuition score.

boosts.name: Expanded Power
boosts.effect: If the ability targets an area, you increase the size of the area by 1. If the area is a line, you increase the size of one dimension, not both.

boosts.name: Extended Power
boosts.effect: If the ability is ranged, the distance gains a bonus equal to your Intuition score. If the ability is melee, the distance gains a +2 bonus.

boosts.name: Heightened Power
boosts.effect: If the ability deals rolled damage, it deals extra damage equal to your Intuition score.

boosts.name: Magnified Power
boosts.effect: If the ability has a potency, you increase that potency by an amount equal to your Intuition score.

boosts.name: Shared Power
boosts.effect: If the ability targets individual creatures or objects, you target one additional creature or object within distance.

boosts.name: Sharpened Power
boosts.effect: If the ability has any roll, that roll gains an edge.
